title: The Birth of Video Games
description: The first video game, Spacewar!, is developed by Steve Russell at MIT, becoming the foundation of modern gaming.

title: The Rise of Arcades
description: Pac-Man is released and becomes a cultural icon, pushing video games into mainstream entertainment.

title: The Revolution of 16-bit Consoles
description: Sega Genesis and SNES arrive, bringing the world more immersive gaming experiences.

title: The Launch of PlayStation
description: Sony releases the PlayStation, marking the beginning of a new era in console gaming, with iconic franchises like Final Fantasy and Metal Gear Solid.

title: The Birth of Online Gaming
description: Games like Diablo II and Unreal Tournament bring multiplayer gaming to the masses over the internet.

title: Xbox Enters the Scene
description: Microsoft's first Xbox console launches, introducing the gaming world to Halo and starting the rivalry between Xbox and PlayStation.

title: World of Warcraft and the MMO Explosion
description: World of Warcraft is released, becoming the most popular MMORPG in the world and influencing the future of online multiplayer games.

title: The Age of Open-World Games
description: Games like Skyrim, The Witcher, and Red Dead Redemption define a new era of exploration and storytelling.

title: The Release of PlayStation 4 and Xbox One
description: The new generation of consoles enters the market, bringing improved graphics, online features, and a new focus on digital gaming.

title: The Rise of Battle Royale Games
description: Games like Fortnite and PUBG dominate the gaming landscape, with millions of players joining the battle royale craze.
